Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB: 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Hghway, 79th; WB: 79th, Southwest Highway, 83rd, Lawndale, 79th, near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Central Park, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via: 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Hghway, 79th.

Westbound buses will operate via: 79th, Southwest Highway, 83rd, Lawndale, 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
